data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My apartment is near the baseball stadium for the local team. Every ____ night, the ____ are ____ with ____ fans. The ____ are ____, ____ people ____ the ____ to ____ from ____ stadium. It's an exciting place to live, but it's not very peaceful!
data.partBlankContent: My apartment is near the baseball stadium for the local team. Every ga__ night, the str____ are pac___ with base____ fans. The ba__ are cro____, a__ people fi__ the tra___ to a__ from t__ stadium. It's an exciting place to live, but it's not very peaceful!
data.answer: 我的公寓离本地球队的棒球场很近。每个比赛之夜，街上都挤满了棒球迷。海湾是交叉的，人们找到了进出体育场的轨道。这是一个令人兴奋的地方，但它不是很平静!
